Title: Provides for an annual growth amount for tuition and regional rate reimbursement for approved school-age and preschool special education programs
Summary: Provides for an annual growth amount for tuition and regional rate reimbursement for approved school-age and preschool special education programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing an annual growth amount for tuition and regional rate reimbursement for approved school-age and preschool special education programs
